derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: probably from Dutch walrus, perhaps by an inversion of elements (influenced by walvis 'whale-fish') of Old Norse hrosshvalr 'horse-whale'

encyclopedia.content: 乐队简介 . 「Walrus」是韩国的原三人摇滚乐队，现增加一名贝斯手成为四人乐队。 乐队由金材昱组建。 乐队的名字来源于Beatles 1967年发表的歌曲《I Am the Walrus》。. 乐队类型：现代摇滚 金材昱 金泰贤 刘承范3位成员是首尔艺术大学同级生，杨时温是原“Bremen”的乐队的成员，现加入Walrus，成为第四名成员，乐队在首尔成立。.. . .金材昱 {上图-中} 金泰贤 {上图-左} 刘承范 {上图-右}乐队成员金材昱 金材昱——主音、贝斯、

entry.def: A walrus is a large, fat animal which lives in the sea. It has two long teeth called tusks that point downwards.

means.word_mean: 1. either of two large northern marine mammals having ivory tusks and tough hide over thick blubber
